title: Poo Avizhum Pozhudhil Lyrics Enakkul Oruvan
stanzas:
poo avizhum pozhudhil
or aayiram kanaa
or kanavin vazhiyil
adhe nila..
paal sirippaal
oli poo thelithaal.

thegam megam
aagum or nilaiye.
megam koodum
neram poo mazhaiye.

en moochu kuzhalile
un paadal thavazhuthe
undaana isaiyile
ul nenjam nanaiyuthe(2)

vaan veli meedhe
venmathi thondrum.
aanveli melae
aval udhithaale.

kaalam neram
meerum or nilaiye.
dhegam thorum
thoovum poo mazhaiye

poo avizhum pozhudhil
or aayiram kanaa
or kanavin vazhiyil
adhe nila..
paal siripaal
oli poo thelithaal.

thegam megam
aagum or nilaiye.
megam koodum
neram poo mazhaiye.

en moochu kuzhalile
un paadal thavazhuthe
undaana isaiyile
ul nenjam nanaiyuthe(2)
